name: Little Helper (itch) (Team Fish)
description:
"It's now the time for your first Assignment", boomed the voice of the founder of Helping Hand Co.
"You're a clumsy little ghost so don't let the client see you while doing your tasks, only then will you get a hefty reward."

CONTROLS
move with WASD
grab with mouse buttons
space to jump
i to open and close inventory

KNOWN BUGS:
- can grab onto other objects while holding an object 
- intro cutscene only works once while starting the game, if you restart the game use the play without cutscene button 

There's really no proper music or sfx at this time so put on your favorite playlist and blast away. 

TEAM FISH this time around was:
Valtteri S. - programming
Arttu - 3D modeling
Aliisa V. and Hekate R. - 2D art and texturing

This game was made in two months part of Pelifarmi in Oulu, Finland.
